description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for a capture screen in a menu image generation app. It manages UI interactions for capturing or importing menu images, handles camera and gallery services, and facilitates navigation to a processing screen. The file also includes a placeholder processing screen class.

classes.name: CaptureScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget allowing users to capture or import menu images, manage state, and navigate to a processing screen.

classes.name: ProcessingArgs
classes.description: A simple data class for passing image data URL to the processing screen.

classes.name: ProcessingScreen
classes.description: A placeholder widget representing the menu image processing screen.

methods.name: _handleCapture
methods.description: Handles the capture of an image from the camera, updating state, and triggering navigation upon success.

methods.name: _handleImport
methods.description: Handles importing an image from the gallery, updating state, and navigating upon success.

methods.name: _showMissingKeySnack
methods.description: Displays a snackbar message if the OpenAI API key is missing.
